com.oreditions.chrono.engine
Class Controller

java.lang.Object
  com.oreditions.chrono.engine.Controller

public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object

This class is the main entry point of the Java package. Its use is above all to create the CCalendar class which is a tree of classes containing all the files of the directories sorted by date

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Main entry point of the java package. Takes only one parameter : the name of the .properties file in which we have the list of directories to be found and the directory for the output.
